name: Gottlob Frege
alma_mater: University of Jena, University of Göttingen (PhD)
main_interests: Philosophy of mathematics, mathematical logic, philosophy of language
influences: Kuno Fischer, Adolf Trendelenburg, "Frege's Technical Concepts", in https://books.google.com/books?id
influenced: Giuseppe Peano, Bertrand Russell, Rudolf Carnap, Ludwig Wittgenstein, Michael Dummett, Edmund Husserl, Gershom Scholem, and most of the Analytic philosophy
notable_ideas: Principle of compositionality, quantification theory, predicate calculus, logicism, sense and reference, Hume's principle, Frege's theorem, Frege–Geach problem, Currying
